title: ATP World Tour Masters 1000, Monte Carlo Masters Men's Singles Seeds Progress
text: April 16, 2018 / 4:34 PM / Updated 32 minutes ago ATP World Tour Masters 1000, Monte Carlo Masters Men's Singles Seeds Progress Reuters Staff 3 Min Read Apr 16 (OPTA) - Seeds Progress from the ATP World Tour Masters 1000, Monte Carlo Masters Men's Singles matches on Monday .. Seeds ..
